name: Islamic Relief USA
mission:
Islamic Relief USA provides relief and development in a dignified manner regardless of gender, race, or religion, and works to empower individuals in their communities and give them a voice in the world.

Incorporated in 1993 in California, Islamic Relief USA has provided humanitarian support in the United States and internationally for nearly 30 years.
theoryOfChange: States that contributions provide immediate relief (food, water, medical aid, shelter) and also support long-term solutions such as community development, water wells, skills training, women launching small businesses, and helping children return to school, with the goal of creating a world free of poverty.

evaluationSources: BBB Wise Giving Alliance Standards for Charity Accountability

zakatClaimEvidence: Dedicated zakat page found at https://irusa.org/zakat (Source: https://irusa.org/zakat)

ui_signals_v1.recommendation_rationale: Strong donor fit, low risk profile, and credible supporting evidence for outcomes.

components.evidence: Explicit zakat program (+4); Muslim-focused organization (+2); Islamic identity (+1); Asnaf: fuqara (+5); Operates in Muslim-majority regions (+3); Strong humanitarian service (+4)
components.name: Muslim Donor Fit

components.improvement_suggestion: Expand services to underserved populations or regions with limited nonprofit coverage
components.name: Underserved Space

alignment.rationale: Alignment 44/50: HIGH Muslim donor fit, humanitarian cause area

components.evidence: No beneficiary data; good program ratio (≥75%) suggests reasonable delivery
components.improvement_suggestion: Track and report beneficiary counts to enable cost analysis
components.name: Cost Per Beneficiary

components.improvement_suggestion: Document why reserves above your policy target are intentional (e.g., restrictions, volatility, planned commitments) and define deployment triggers.
components.name: Financial Health

score_details.score_summary: Islamic Relief USA shows exceptional alignment and strong impact, with zakat compliance.

zakat.claim_evidence: Dedicated zakat page found at https://irusa.org/zakat (Source: https://irusa.org/zakat)

all_citations.claim: Islamic Relief USA holds a 100.0/100 rating for accountability and financial health, with a program expense ratio of 80.3%.
The organization is zakat-eligible and follows specific policies for asnaf categories.
The organization reported total revenue of $165,235,589.
Islamic Relief USA provided direct support to Bahri Hospital and forcibly displaced families in Sudan.
Programs include the rehabilitation of Bahri Hospital and fortification of the Palestinian medical sector.
The charity provides multiple donation options and giving methods for humanitarian aid.

baseline_narrative.amal_score_rationale: With a GMG score of 81/100, Islamic Relief USA demonstrates high transparency and financial efficiency, backed by a perfect rating from third-party evaluators.
areas_for_improvement: Expanding direct service impact metrics across all domestic programs
Reducing fundraising costs from $0.17 per $1 raised to further maximize program allocations

dimension_explanations.alignment: Islamic Relief USA shows high alignment for Muslim donors through its zakat-eligible status and focus on urgent humanitarian causes [2][6]. The organization maintains a strong track record in supporting forcibly displaced families and vulnerable populations globally [4].
dimension_explanations.impact: The organization achieves high impact through direct services, such as rehabilitating the Bahri Hospital and fortifying the Palestinian medical sector [4][5]. Its financial health is robust, reporting a total revenue of $165,235,589 and a high program expense ratio of 80.3% [1][3].

baseline_narrative.headline: Islamic Relief USA provides comprehensive humanitarian aid and poverty alleviation programs both domestically and internationally.
strengths: Perfect Charity Navigator score of 100.0/100 indicating top-tier accountability and financial health
Strong program expense ratio of 80.3% ensuring the majority of funds reach those in need
Exceptional working capital of 18.0 months providing significant long-term organizational stability
baseline_narrative.summary: Islamic Relief USA is a non-profit organization dedicated to creating a world free of poverty through emergency response and long-term development [1][4]. The organization is verified as zakat-eligible, maintaining a dedicated policy to ensure funds reach the appropriate asnaf categories [2].
